channel.title: Shortbow and it says "there is not enough arrows in your quiver"
channel.description:
How would i make it so that you could range with a shortbow and it doesnt say you dont have enough arrows in your quiver when i have arrows. Im trying not to be gay and go like ????? PLZZZZZZZZ HELP! Sorry if i sound like that :S.
Thanks for reading, hope you can help.

item.title: Shortbow and it says "there is not enough arrows in your quiver"
item.dc:creator: @pk3r_john pk3r john
item.description:
@pk3r_john wrote:

shortbow doesn’t work either, i did all the same things like the seercull and it doesn’t work.
and for bigh51, how about YOU try to do this?
and the problem with the shortbow is, it says you do not have enough arrows in your quiver.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @mylust4blood mylust4blood
item.description:
@mylust4blood wrote:

take the sercull bow code(since it sucks)

search in client.java

change it to the knife code and change the gfx and emote

and bam!
